eu.anorien.mhl
Interface Hypothesis

public interface Hypothesis

This hypothesis is created by the library when the application requests the best, or all the hypotheses maintained by the library. Therefore it is a global hypothesis.

For the hypothesis generated by the application in an hypothesis generation see GeneratedHypothesis.

See Also:
getBestHypothesis, getAllHypotheses
